no_robots:
To protect the site, we need to make sure you are a real person.
We are sorry, but robots are not allowed to participate:
pre_login: You are not logged in! Please
not_valid: Your email is not yet validated!
question: Question
required_text: Fields marked with * are required. All other fields are optional.
admin_cluster--add: Add selection to cluster & ignore rest
admin_cluster--missing: Please enter a new taxonomy or select an existing taxonomy from the drop-down and try again.
survey_ask--validate: Please validate your email before asking another question.
survey_ask--intro: We are interested in your questions. You can ask anything. Please try to be as clear as possible, be polite and constructive. All questions are reviewed before they are published on the platform. Questions that do not align with our code of conduct are removed from the platform.
survey_ask--about_title: Tell us a little bit about yourself
survey_ask--about_copy: We want this survey to represent all groups in our society, therefore it helps us to know a few things about you. This information is stored separately from your question and cannot be associated with you as a person
survey_ask--intouch_copy: When you register you can get updates on your questions. We will not share your information with third-parties and only inform you about survey-related topics. You can delete your account at any time.
survey_ask--register_copy: For registration purposes, please provide us with your email and a password for your account. The password should at least be 8 characters long and contain at least one number and one letter.
survey_ask--login_copy: Please provide your email and password, so we can log you in and add your question.
survey_ask--thanks: Thanks for submitting your question. Our robot helpers found a couple of questions, they think, are related to yours. You would really help us, if you could rate how strongly you think those questions are related to your Question.
survey_ask--msg_error: Something went wrong submitting your question. Please try again in a moment.
survey_ask--msg_postcode: The entered postcode is not valid.
survey_ask--msg_login: We could not log you in, with the credentials you provided. Please check them.
survey_ask--msg_password: Please enter a valid password (at least 8 characters, numbers and letters).
survey_ask--msg_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
survey_ask--msg_question: Please enter a valid question, at least 10 characters long.
survey_ask--msg_robot: Please answer the robot test at the end of the form, before submitting
survey_ask--msg_robot_again: Please fill out the robot test at the end of the form. This is not your fault. Sometimes when the internet is too slow, the robot test becomes invalid before we can check it.
survey_ask--msg_inuse: This email adress is already in use.
survey_ask--txt_find: Finding connections between your Question and other Questions on the platform
